resources.string:
Disclaimer !


Before asking a question always check the FAQs section to check if the answers to your problem already exists. This will save you more time.

Use appropriate tags to make your questions as specific as possible as this will help the Instructors to handle your questions faster and satifactorily.

if you want to recieve answers privately and remain anonymous in the system, mark the checkboxes appropriatly.

Remember someone else maybe having the same problem as yours therefore sharing your solutions may help others also to learn.

NO field should be left blank for your questions to be submited.

Jokers will be automaticaly ignored and their accounts suspended .

asked questions should be answerd within 30 minutes

Thank you for being Responsible in the system
